filename: DCD to client with envelope.docx
summary: This letter is to inform Mr. East that a check in the amount of $286.50 has been enclosed, which is the remaining balance of the delayed cost deposit withheld from his settlement proceeds. The additional costs were copies, postage, telephone calls, etc. Brandon Doll thanks Mr. East for the opportunity to represent him and offers to be of further assistance in the future.

filename: FL - UM Demand Cover Letter with Lawsuit Filed.docx
summary: This document is a letter from Stefanie Young of Progressive Insurance to the Defendant's Carrier, demanding that they tender their policy limits for an underinsured motorist claim. It also serves as a formal notice of intent to pursue the claim, and states that a lawsuit has been filed and service of process is being held for 5 days. The letter is a one-time offer to settle prior to service.

filename: FL Affidavits for Demand.docx
summary: This document is an affidavit from Cynthia Fake, who states that on April 25, 2021, she owned a vehicle insured with Progressive Insurance, under policy number . She also states that she does not have any umbrella coverage or any other liability coverage available for any incident involving this vehicle on this date of incident. The affidavit was sworn to and subscribed before a notary public in the State of Florida.

filename: FL Def LOR to Insurance w_ Spoliation - PHB.docx
summary: This letter is from Progressive Insurance to their client Donhav Noname regarding a claim for damages resulting from an accident on April 25, 2021. The letter requests information about any policies of insurance that may provide liability coverage for the claim, as well as copies of statements, appraisal reports, photographs, and medical authorizations. It also requests that the insured preserve their cell phone and the vehicle involved in the accident, as well as any electronic data related to the incident.

filename: FL Early Discovery to Plaintiff.docx
summary: This document is a request for Donhav Noname to answer questions about their case in order to proceed with litigation. It includes questions about their educational and vocational background, medical providers, past employments, any accidents they have been involved in, any claims they have made, their activities before the accident, any witnesses, any arrests or convictions, and any photographs or videos related to the incident. It also includes a certification that the document was signed by Donhav Noname.

filename: FL FU Pay Me.docx
summary: This letter is from Brandon Doll of State Farm Insurance Company to an adjuster, informing them that their settlement offer of $25,000 has been rejected and a new offer of $10,000 has been made. The offer will remain open for 10 days, and if it is not accepted, a complaint will be filed. The letter also requests that the adjuster contact Preston Blair to discuss settlement.

filename: FL KS-RFA to Def Driver.docx
summary: This document is a Request for Admissions to Defendant in a case filed in the Ninth Judicial District of Florida. The Plaintiff, Andrew East, is requesting the Defendant, Donhav Noname, to admit in writing the truth of fourteen numbered matters related to the accident in question. The matters include the jurisdiction of the court, service of process, the amount of damages, the Defendant's negligence, and the Plaintiff's injuries.

filename: FL KS-RFA to Def Owner.docx
summary: This is a request for admissions to Defendant Cynthia Fake in the case of Andrew East vs. Donhav Noname in the Ninth Judicial District of Florida, Case No. CT-2021:001. The plaintiff is requesting the defendant to admit in writing the truth of fourteen numbered matters related to the case.

filename: FL KS-RTP to Def Driver.docx
summary: This document is a Request to Produce from Plaintiff Andrew East to Defendant Cynthia Fake in the Ninth Judicial District of Florida. It outlines the definitions of "document" and "person" and requests a list of documents and statements to be produced within 45 days. It also requests that the documents be organized and labeled according to the individual paragraphs of the request to which they are responsive. The documents requested include statements made by any occupants of the vehicles involved in the accident, photographs and videos of the vehicles and the scene of the accident, repair bills and estimates, insurance policies, appraisals of property damage, surveillance films, insurance agreements, and computer generated documents.

filename: FL KS-RTP to Def Owner.docx
summary: This document is a Request to Produce from Plaintiff Andrew East to Defendant Cynthia Fake in the Ninth Judicial District of Florida. It outlines the definitions of "document" and "person" and requests that any documents withheld under a claim of privilege be identified. It also requests that documents be organized and labeled according to the individual paragraphs of the request to which they are responsive. The request includes documents such as statements made by occupants of the vehicles involved in the accident, photographs and videos of the vehicles and the scene of the accident, repair bills and estimates, insurance policies, and computer generated documents.

filename: FL KS-Rogs to Def Driver.docx
summary: This document is a notice of service of interrogatories to Defendant Cynthia Fake in the ninth judicial district of Florida, Case No. ct-2021:001, in which Plaintiff Andrew East is suing Defendant Donhav Noname. The interrogatories are to be answered within 45 days from the date of service. The interrogatories ask for information such as the name and address of the person answering, former names, addresses, and Social Security number, any convictions, insurance policies, details of the incident, any other parties who may be liable, any violations of law, names and addresses of witnesses, any mechanical defects, any agreements limiting liability, any lawsuits, physical infirmity, consumption of alcohol or drugs, expert witnesses, and cell phone information.

filename: FL KS-Rogs to Def Owner.docx
summary: Andrew East, Plaintiff, has served notice of propounding Interrogatories to Defendant Cynthia Fake, to be answered within 45 days from the date of service. The interrogatories cover topics such as insurance policies, the incident in question, negligence, affirmative defenses, other liable parties, any violations of law, witnesses, expert witnesses, agreements, prior lawsuits, physical infirmities, alcohol/drug consumption, mechanical defects, vehicle ownership, permission to drive, mission/activity, vehicle damage, and information/assistance provided.

filename: FL KSMPOA - Closing by Mail with POA.docx
summary: This document is a certified return receipt for Andrew East regarding his settlement in the Preston Blair v. Andrew East TEST MATTER DO NOT EDIT case. It includes a closing statement, power of attorney, and release, which must be signed in the presence of a notary public. Once the signed documents are received, a proceeds check should be ready within 10-14 days. If there are any questions, contact Preston Blair at (901) 333-1823.

filename: FL LIT - Summons (Alachua).docx
summary: This document is a summons issued by the Circuit Court of the 11th Judicial Circuit in and for Miami-Dade County, Florida, to the defendant, Cynthia Fake, requiring them to serve written defenses to the complaint or petition on the plaintiff's attorney, Kelly Jones, within 20 days of service of the summons. It also informs the defendant of their right to an attorney and of the accommodations available to persons with disabilities.

filename: FL M2Consolidate (Amy).docx
summary: This document is a motion to consolidate and transfer related cases in the County Court of the Thirteenth Judicial Circuit in and for Hillsborough County, Florida. The cases involve unpaid personal injury protection (“PIP”) benefits and/or Medical Payments coverage, interest, and penalty and postage on overdue PIP benefits. The motion requests that the cases be consolidated and transferred to Division 77 in order to prevent duplicative litigation, promote judicial economy, minimize the parties’ expenses, and avoid the possibility of inconsistent results.

filename: FL Notice to Client - Potential of losing Medicaid benefits.docx
summary: This document is regarding the settlement of a bodily injury case with the tortfeasor for $5,000.00. Andrew East has been informed that he must notify Medicaid/Staywell/SSI of the settlement within ten days of receiving the proceeds check. He has been warned that the settlement may affect his and his family's eligibility for Medicaid/Staywell/SSI benefits. He has chosen to have the settlement proceeds issued directly to him and not placed into a Special Needs Trust Fund.

filename: FL Proposal for Settlement with Notice (PFS).docx
summary: This document is a Notice of Service of Proposal for Settlement in the case of Andrew East vs. Donhav Noname in the Ninth Judicial District of Florida. The Proposal for Settlement is made by Plaintiff, Donhav Noname, to Defendant, Cynthia Fake, for a total sum of $50.00 to settle all damages that would otherwise be awarded in a final judgment in the case. The Proposal for Settlement also states that attorneys' fees are not included.

filename: FL Records Request with HIPAA.docx
summary: This document is an authorization for the release of protected health information (PHI) from AdventHealth Fish Memorial to Morgan & Morgan for Kelly Jones, who was involved in an incident on April 25, 2021. The PHI requested includes all medical information from any source, including handwritten notes, telephone memoranda, outside records, correspondence, or any other tangible item maintained in the patient's chart. A photocopy of this authorization is considered as valid as the original.

filename: FL Reduce Bill (1).docx
summary: This letter is to request that Baptist Hospital accept a reduced amount of $ as full satisfaction of the outstanding balance for Andrew East, who sustained injuries in an accident on 11/25/2021. If the hospital is in agreement, they are asked to sign and return the letter indicating their acceptance of the offer.

filename: FL Reduce Bill (2).docx
summary: This letter is to request that Tampa General Hospital accept a reduced amount of $ as full satisfaction of the outstanding balance for Andrew East's medical bills, in order to avoid trial. The letter is signed by Preston Blair and includes the date, account number, and loss date.

filename: FL Reduce Bill (3).docx
summary: This letter is to request that Radiology Associates of Tampa accept a reduced amount of $ as full satisfaction of the outstanding balance for Andrew East's medical bills related to an accident on 11/25/2021. If they are in agreement, they are asked to sign and return the letter indicating their acceptance of the offer.

filename: FL Reduce Bill (4).docx
summary: This letter is to request that 3T Radiology & Research accept a reduced amount of $ as full satisfaction of the outstanding balance for Andrew East's injuries sustained in an accident on 11/25/2021. If the facility is in agreement, they are asked to sign and return the letter indicating their acceptance of the offer.

filename: FL Reduce Bill.docx
summary: This letter is to request that Baptist Hospital accept a reduced amount of $ as full satisfaction of the outstanding balance for Andrew East's injuries sustained in an accident on 11/25/2021. If the hospital is in agreement, they are asked to sign and return the letter indicating their acceptance of the offer.

filename: FL Waiver of Subrogation - UM case Permission ALL offices.docx
summary: This letter is from Stefanie Young Esq. to Casey Beach of Progressive Insurance. It requests that Progressive waive subrogation and contractually waive removal of any potential UM action to Federal Court in the case of Donhav Noname, whose loss occurred on 04/25/2021.

filename: JAO Notice of Substitution of Counsel within Firm.docx
summary: This document is a Notice of Substitution of Counsel of Record for Plaintiff Preston Blair in the Circuit Court of the 11th Judicial Circuit in and for Miami-Dade County, Florida. Jessica Orenstein, Esquire is taking the place of the previous attorney and will handle all future matters related to the case. All future notices, motions, correspondence, pleadings, and court orders should be sent to Jessica Orenstein, Esquire at kjones@forthepeople.com and pblair@forthepeople.com. A copy of the document has been sent to counsel of record via the Florida e-portal and/or e-mail.

filename: Litigation Checklist.docx
summary: This document is a litigation checklist for a pre-suit case. It includes items such as a signed lit letter, HI information, PIP log, BI liability and UM declarations, crash report, spoilation letter, property damage estimates, injury photos, witness statements, wage loss information, prior medical records, bills/records to-date, and all applicable fields and LDOT updated in Litify. It also includes additional comments and expiration dates for notice of claim or SF 95, CRN statutory waiting period, and pending or active bankruptcy of client.

filename: Milti FL HIPAA Form Page 1 - Multiple Parties (1).docx
summary: This document is an authorization for the patient to release their protected health information (PHI) to their attorney, Morgan & Morgan, for the purpose of their case. The PHI requested includes all medical information from any source, including records, notes, correspondence, photographs, and more. A photocopy of this authorization is considered valid as the original.

A photocopy of this authorization is considered valid as the original.

filename: Multi FL Medical Records Request w Hipaa form (1).docx
summary: This document is an authorization for the release of protected health information (PHI) from Coastal Healthcare Partners to Preston Blair, a paralegal at Morgan & Morgan, P.A., on behalf of Donhav Noname, who was involved in an automobile accident in April 2021. The PHI requested includes all medical information of any nature whatsoever, from any source whatsoever, which is maintained by Coastal Healthcare Partners in their records regarding Donhav Noname. Photostatic copies of this authorization are valid as the original.

filename: Multi FL Medical Records Request w Hipaa form (2).docx
summary: This document is an authorization for the release of protected health information (PHI) from AdventHealth Fish Memorial to Preston Blair, a paralegal at Morgan & Morgan, P.A., for the purpose of representing Donhav Noname in a claim related to an automobile accident that occurred on 4/25/2021. The authorization allows for the release of all medical information of any nature whatsoever, from any source whatsoever, which is maintained by the healthcare provider in their records regarding the referenced patient.

filename: Multi FL Medical Records Request w Hipaa form (3).docx
summary: This document is an authorization for the release of protected health information (PHI) from Tampa General Hospital to Preston Blair, a paralegal at Morgan & Morgan, P.A., on behalf of Andrew East. The PHI requested includes all medical information of any nature whatsoever, from any source whatsoever, which is maintained by the hospital in their records regarding the referenced patient. The authorization is in compliance with the Federal Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act, HIPAA, 45 CFR 164.104.

filename: Multi FL Medical Records Request w Hipaa form (4).docx
summary: This document is an authorization for Preston Blair to receive protected health information from David Bennett DC regarding Preston Blair's medical records. The information requested includes all medical information from any source, including handwritten notes, telephone memoranda, outside records, correspondence, or any other tangible item maintained in the chart. The authorization also includes mental health, psychiatric, chemical dependency, and HIV records.

The information requested includes all medical information from any source, including handwritten notes, telephone memoranda, outside records, correspondence, or any other tangible item maintained in the patient's chart. A photostatic copy of this authorization is valid as the original.

filename: Multi FL Medical Records Request w Hipaa form (6).docx

The protected health information includes all medical information from any source, including handwritten notes, telephone memoranda, outside records, correspondence, or any other tangible item maintained in the chart. If there is a charge for these items, MD Now Medical Center-West Flagler must provide an invoice with their tax identification number.

The information requested includes all medical information from any source, including handwritten notes, telephone memoranda, outside records, correspondence, or any other tangible item maintained in the chart. The authorization also includes mental health, psychiatric, chemical dependency, and HIV records.

filename: Multi FL Medical Records Request w Hipaa form (8).docx

The information requested includes all medical information of any nature from any source maintained by Mauricio Chiropractic West, including handwritten notes, telephone memoranda, outside records, correspondence, or any other tangible item maintained in the patient's chart. A photostatic copy of this authorization is as valid as the original.

filename: Multi FL Medical Records Request w Hipaa form.docx
summary: This document is a medical authorization form for Donhav Noname, who was involved in an automobile accident in April 2021. It authorizes Advanced Imaging to release all medical information related to the accident to Preston Blair, a paralegal at Morgan & Morgan, P.A. in Memphis, TN. The authorization includes all medical records, handwritten notes, telephone memoranda, outside records, correspondence, or any other tangible item maintained in the patient's chart.

filename: Multi party zero letter to provider (1).docx
summary: This letter is from Morgan & Morgan Fort Myers PLLC to Advanced Diagnostic Group requesting an itemized list of services and charges for their client, Donhav Noname, who was injured in an accident on 4/22/2021. They are also requesting information regarding any outstanding balances and a Patient Account Balance form to be filled out. The letter also includes an Authorization for Release of Protected Health Information (PHI) under the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA).

filename: Multi party zero letter to provider (2).docx
summary: This document is a letter from Morgan & Morgan Fort Myers PLLC to David Bennett DC requesting an itemized list of services and charges for Donhav Noname, who was injured in an accident on 4/22/2021. It also includes an authorization for the release of protected health information under the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA). The letter requests a response within ten days and provides contact information for Preston Blair, Esquire.

filename: Multi party zero letter to provider (3).docx
summary: This letter is from Preston Blair of Morgan & Morgan Fort Myers PLLC to Winter Park Integrity Medical Group, LLC, requesting information regarding Donhav Noname's medical records and any outstanding balances for treatment related to an accident that occurred on 4/22/2021. The letter requests an itemized list of services and charges, as well as a response to the letter within ten days. It also includes an authorization for the release of protected health information under HIPAA.

filename: Multi party zero letter to provider (4).docx
summary: This letter is from Morgan & Morgan Fort Myers PLLC to Mauricio Chiropractic West requesting an itemized list of services and charges for Donhav Noname, who was injured in an accident on 4/22/2021. The letter requests that any outstanding balances be indicated on the attached form and that a response be provided in writing within ten days. It also includes an authorization for the release of protected health information under HIPAA.

filename: Multi party zero letter to provider (5).docx
summary: This document is a letter from Morgan & Morgan Atlanta PLLC to Andrew East requesting an itemized list of services and charges for medical treatment rendered in connection with an accident that occurred on 11/11/2021. It also requests that any outstanding balances be indicated on the attached form and that the response be in writing. It provides contact information for Preston Blair should any questions arise.

filename: Multi party zero letter to provider (6).docx
summary: This letter is from Morgan & Morgan Atlanta PLLC to Aetna requesting an itemized list of services and charges for their client, Andrew East, who sustained injuries in an accident on 11/11/2021. They are also requesting information regarding any outstanding balances and a Patient Account Balance form to be filled out. Aetna is asked to respond to this letter within ten days and all account balances must be in writing. Additionally, an Authorization for Release of Protected Health Information (PHI) is included.

filename: Multi party zero letter to provider.docx
summary: This letter is from Morgan & Morgan Fort Myers PLLC to MD Now Medical Center-West Flagler requesting an itemized list of services and charges for Donhav Noname, who was injured in an accident on 4/22/2021. The letter also includes an authorization for the release of protected health information under HIPAA. The letter requests a response within ten days and requests that all account balances be in writing.

filename: NEW Demand Exemplar.docx
summary: This document is a letter from a law firm representing Donhav Noname in a negligence claim against an insured party. The letter outlines the details of the incident, the injuries sustained, and the economic and non-economic damages. It also includes a settlement offer of $10,000, the policy limits, and conditions for settlement. The letter also requests an affidavit of no other liability coverage, an affidavit stating the insured was not in the course & scope of their employment/agency, and an assets affidavit from the insured.

filename: Notice to Defendant.docx
summary: This letter is from a law firm representing Donhav Noname in a claim for damages resulting from an automobile accident that occurred on April 25, 2021. The letter requests that Ms. Cynthia Fake complete and return the attached Information Sheet so that the law firm can communicate directly with her insurance company to avoid any prejudice or inconvenience. If Ms. Fake does not have insurance, she is asked to contact the law firm as soon as possible.

filename: Transfer Request Litigation Checklist.docx
summary: This document is a checklist for a transfer request for a case between Preston Blair and Andrew East in Florida. It includes questions about the location of the accident, the at-fault person, the injured party, the type of injuries, the amount of medical bills, the amount of wage loss, the amount of property damage, the amount of coverage from the insurance companies, and the documents that are needed.

filename: Zero letter to provider.docx
summary: This letter is a request from Preston Blair, a paralegal representing Donhav Noname, for a written statement of any outstanding balance for treatment rendered in connection with an accident on April 25, 2021. The response must be in writing and must be received within ten days. If there are any questions, Preston Blair can be contacted directly.
